history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />. You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER I would like transit directions.
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER Going to the waterfront.
TTS Okay, going to the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Forbes and Murray
TTS Okay, leaving from murray avenue at forbes avenue far side. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER at 4 p.m.
TTS Okay, travelling at 04:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 23 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 61C <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 8th avenue at Amity St FS.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 4:00pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 8 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 149 West Bridge St, Homestead, PA 15120, USA. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER Goodbye.
